    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean Circle.containsPoint​(Point x)
    Decides whether a given point lies inside the circle.
    boolean RegHexagon.containsPoint​(Point x)
    Decides whether a given point lies inside the hexagon (uses Regular Triangle's method).
    boolean RegTriangle.containsPoint​(Point x)
    Decides whether a given point lies inside the regular triangle.
    abstract boolean Shape.containsPoint​(Point x)
    Method for deciding if a given point lies inside the shape.
    boolean Square.containsPoint​(Point x)
    Decides whether a given point lies inside the square.
    Constructors in assignment1 with parameters of type Point 
    Constructor Description
    Circle​(Point center, double radius)
    Constructs a Circle using a center point and radius.
    RegHexagon​(Point center, double sideLength)
    Constructs a Regular Hexagon using a center point and side length.
    RegTriangle​(Point center, double sideLength)
    Constructs a Regular Triangle using a center point and side length.
    RegTriangle​(Point a, Point b, Point c)
    Constructs a Triangle using three points.
    Shape​(Point center, double sideLength)
    Constructs a Shape object using a center point and side length.
    Square​(Point center, double sideLength)
    Constructs a Square using a center point and side length.
